APR FC vs Rayon Sports

APR FC 2-1 Rayon Sports

Uko umukino uri kugenda

Umwanditsi

: Ngabo Roben

Amafoto

: Ntare Julius

20:22

Ibyishimo byari byose ku bafana n'abakinnyi ba APR FC

20:00

Umukino urangiye ku ntsinzi ya APR FC

Agahinda gakomeye ku bakunzi ba Rayon Sports, ibirori kuri APR FC, intsinzi itashye mu ikipe y'ingabo z'u Rwanda yakinnye iminota myinshi ari bake kubera ikarita itukura yahawe Nizeyimana Mirafa

19:58

93' Rusheshangoga ahawe ikarita y'umuhondo

Nyuma yo gutsinda igitego ku munota wa nyuma Michel Rusheshangoga akuye mo umupira ahanishwa ikarita y'umuhondo

19:57

92' IGITEGO CYA KABIRI CYA APR FC

Igitego cyiza cya APR FC ku ishoti rikomeye ritewe na Michel Rusheshango wagiye mu kibuga asimbuye ari muri metero nka 35 uvuye ku izamu ririnzwe na Bashunga Abouba

19:54

Iminota ine y'inyongera

Iminota 90 irangiye amakipe yombi anganya 1-1 none abasifuzi bemeje ko hongerwa ho iminota ine y'inyongera

19:53

89' Sarpong ateye mu izamu ku nshuro ya kabiri ariko yari yaraririye

Abakunzi ba Rayon Sports bahagurukiye rimwe bazi ko umupira Radu ahinduye ukinjizwa mu izamu na Sarpong Michael ari igitego cyabo cya kabiri ariko umusifuzi Ndagijimana Theogene uri ku ruhande yemeza ko habanje kubaho kurarira

19:51

87' DaSilva ahushije igitego cyashoboraga guhesha intsinzi Rayon Sports

Nyuma yo kwinjira mu kibuga kwa rutahizamu DaSilva, mugenzi we Sarpong ari gukina ahengamiye ku mpande. Afashe umupira awuha Radu ukina iburyo ahindura umupira mwiza ashaka umunya-Brazil ariko ntiyawukoraho urengera ku rundi ruhande

19:49

Nta kipe ishaka gutakaza uyu mukino

19:47

85' IGITEGO CYO KWISHYURA CYA RAYON SPORTS

Umupira uzamukanywe neza na myugariro Manzi Thierry awuha Michael Sarpong wari kumwe na Buregeya Prince ariko amurusha imbaraga aroba umunyezamu yishyurira ikipe ye

19:43

82' Gusimbuza ku ruhande rwa APR FC

Michel Rusheshangoga myugariro ufite inararibonye afashe umwanya wa Issa Bigirimana watsinze igitego mu rwego rwo kongera imbaraga mu bwugarizi

19:41

79' APR FC ihushije igitego cyabazwe

Raphael Da Silva atakaje umupira ufatwa na Issa Bigirimana awucomekera Savio Nshuti wari imbere y'izamu ariko ntiyaribona neza aha Muhadjiri ariko atera hejuru

19:40

Umutoza Robertinho ahagurukije umukinnyi Nova Bayama ngo yishyushye

Manishimwe Djabel ugaragaza umunaniro ashobora gusimburwa na Nova Bayama wamaze gutangira kwishyushya

19:36

Da Silva, umunya-Bresil uhanzwe amaso muri uyu mukino


Mugiraneza Jean Baptiste uzwi nka Migi, nta munota wâ€™ubusa ari guha uyu musore ukomoka muri Bresil ukinnye umukino we wa mbere muri Rayon Sports

19:35

72' UMUTAMBIKO utabaye APR FC

APR FC irugarijwe. Nyuma yo guhabwa ikarita itukura iri gukina yugarira cyane. Mugisha Gilbert atunguye umunyezamu ari hagati mu kibuga atera ishoti rikomeye rikubita ku mutambiko umupira ujya hanze

19:33

70' Kimenyi Yves atabaye izamu rya APR FC

Rutanga Eric na Manishimwe Djabel bahererekanyije umupira neza ku ruhande rw'ibumoso bawuhindura bashaka rutahizamu Michael Sarpong ariko umunyezamu Kimenyi Yves atabara izamu rye arawufata

19:31

Rayon Sports irashaka kwishyura

Iminota icumi yâ€™igice cya mbere yose Rayon Sports iyimaze iri gusatira ku kigero cyo hejuru ari nabyo biri gutuma APR FC ikora amakosa menshi. Imaze kubona koruneri ebyiri mu minota icumi gusa

19:26

63' Gusimbuza kwa mbere ku ruhande rwa APR FC

Nshuti Dominique Savio asimbuye Mugunga Yves utorohewe n'uyu mukino.

19:24

60' IKARITA ITUKURA KURI Nizeyimana Mirafa

Raphael Da Silva afashe umupira acenga Nshimiyimana Imran asatira Nizeyimana Mirafa ariko uyu mukinnyi APR FC yavanye muri Police FC amukorera ikosa ritumye ahabwa ikarita y'umuhondo ya kabiri bimubera ikarita itukura

19:20

Amafoto y'igitego rukumbi kimaze kuboneka muri uyu mukino

19:20

56' Tackle nzinza ya Buregeya Prince

Michael Sarpong afashe umupira utakajwe na Mugiraneza Migi ariko awukurwaho neza na Buregeya Prince uteye umuserebeko unogeye ijisho

19:17

53' Rutahizamu Da Silva akorewe ikosa akigera mu kibuga

Umunya-Brazil yinjiye ahabwa amashyi menshi ahita akorerwa ho ikosa ku mupira wa mbere ariko coup franc ibonetse Rutanga ayiteye hejuru y'izamu

19:14

Gusimbuza ku ruhande rwa Rayon Sports

Rutahizamu Raphael DaSilva agiye mu kibuga asimbiye Donkor Prosper Kuka bivuga ko umutoza Robertinho yongereye imbaraga mu busatirizi

19:11

APR FC itangiye yotsa igitutu

Guhererekanya neza hagati ya Muhadjiri Hakizimana na Nizeyimana Mirafa baganaga izamu ariko umupira ugaruwe neza na Iradukunda Eric wa Rayon Sports

19:09

Igice cya kabiri kiratangiye

Mugunga Yves ahise asubiza umupira ku izamu rye ariko Herve Rugwiro ahita arenza umupira

19:08

Abakinnyi b'impande zombi bagarutse mu kibuga

Abafataga ku mazi ni mushyiremo agatege kuko turagarutse igice cya kabiri kigiye gutangira

18:54

Igice cya mbere kirangiye APR FC iyoboye umukino n'igitego 1-0

Iminota ya nyuma y'igice cya mbere Rayon Sports yokeje igitutu cyane ariko ntibyagira icyo biyimarira. Kirangiye itsinzwe 1-0 cyinjijwe na Issa Bigirimana

18:51

45' Ikarita y'umuhondo ya kabiri kuri APR FC

Nyuma yo gukora amakosa ane yikurikiranya Mugiraneza Jean Baptiste Migi ahawe ikarita y'umuhondo ku ikosa akoreye Sarpong ribyaye Coup franc

18:49

42' Rayon Sports ntabwo iva ku izamu rya APR FC

Michael Sarpong akorewe ikosa na Mugiraneza Jean Migi haboneka coup franc, iterwa neza na Rutanga ashaka umutwe wa Yannick Mukunzi ariko we ntiyaboneza mu izamu ahubwo atera hejuru

18:45

38' Rutanga yariye karungu

Rayon Sports ikomeje gushaka uburyo bwayibyarira igitego ariko byanze. Rutanga ahawe umupira na Niyonzima Olivier Sefu atungura umunyezamu Kimenyi ariko uyu munyezamu bakinana mu ikipe y'igihugu Amavubi awufata neza

18:42

36' Rayon Sports ihushije igitego cyabazwe

Umupira uzamukanywe na Manishimwe Djabel uri kwitwara neza aha umupira Sarpong atera ishoti rikomeye ariko umupira uca hejuru y'izamu gato

18:41

35' Rayon Sports yihariye umukino

Nyuma yo gutsindwa igitego ikipe ya Rayon Sports niyo iri kwiharira umukino ariko APR FC ikomeje kugarira neza kuko izamu rya Kimenyi ntiriri kwugarizwa

18:39

Ikarita y'umuhondo ya mbere ku ruhande rwa APR FC

Umukino urakomeje Donkor Prosper Kuka afashe umupira awuha Djabel Manishimwe agerageje kwiruka akorerwa ikosa na Ombolenga Fitina ahita ahabwa ikarita y'umuhondo

18:38

32' Umukino urahagaze

Umunyezamu Kimenyi Yves avuze ku nshuro ya kabiri ko ari kubabara ubu ari kwitabwaho n'abaganga

18:36

28' Migiraneza Jean Baptiste Migi arihanangirijwe

Mugiraneza Migi akoreye ikosa Manishimwe Djabel uri gufasha Rayon Sports gusatira bashaka igitego cyo kwishyura, umusifuzi amubwira ko irindi kosa rimubyarira ikarita y'umuhondo

18:30

Ikarita y'umuhondo ya mbere y'umukino

Nyuma yo kwihanangirizwa Donkor Prosper Kuka yongeye gukorera ikosa Muhadjiri Hakizimana none ahanishijwe ikarita y'umuhondo

18:27

20' Abafana ba Rayon Sports ntabwo bishimiye icyemezo cy'umusifuzi

Niyonzima Olivier Sefu agonganye na Iranzi Jean Claude amwambura umupira agiye kwirukanka agana izamu umusifuzi Uwikunda yemeza ko yabanje gukora ikosa ariko abafana ntibemeranya nawe

18:25

19' Kurarira ku ruhande rwa APR FC

Umukino urakomeje Kimenyi atera umupira muremure imbere ashaka Issa Bigirimana ariko asanga yaraririye

18:24

18' Kimenyi Yves aryamye hasi

Umunyezamu wa APR FC akuye mo umupira wari uvuye muri Koruneri agongana na Sarpong arababara ari kwitabwaho n'abaganga

18:23

16' Rayon Sports ihushije igitego cyabazwe

Abdul Rwatubyaye acomekeye umupira Michael Sarpong awutanguranwa na Kimenyi ariko uyu munyezamu wa APR FC agerageje kuwufata biranga arawuhusha ugana mu izamu ariko Buregeya Prince araritabara arawurenza. Koruneri yavuyemo ntacyo ibyaye.

18:19

13' Manishimwe Djabel agerageje kwishyura ariko biranga

Manishimwe Djabel wa Rayon Sports azamukanye umupira ku ruhande rw'ibumoso atera ishoti rikomeye ashaka gutungura umunyezamu Kimenyi Yves ariko umupira uca hejuru y'izamu

18:16

08' IGITEGO CYA APR FC

Ku burangare bwa ba myugariro ba Rayon Sports Muhadjii Hakizimana acomekeye umupira mwiza Issa Bigirimana asigarana na Manzi Thierry arirukanka aramusiga asigarana n'umunyezamu Bashunga atera umupira mu ruhande adahagaze mo afungura amazamu

18:12

06' Donkor Prosper Kuka yihanangirijwe n'umusifuzi

Umukinnyi wo hagati wa Rayon Sports Donkor ukomoka muri Ghana akoreye ikosa Muhadjiri Hakizimana yihanangirizwa na Uwikunda Samuel. Coup franc ivuye mo Iranzi Jean Claude yari ayibyaje igitego ariko umupira uca ku ruhande gato.

18:09

Abakinnyi 11 babanje mu kibuga muri Rayon Sports

Umunyezamu: Bashunga Abouba,

Ba myugariro: Iradukunda Eric Radu, Abdul Rwatubyaye, Manzi Thierry, Rutanga Eric

Abakina hagati: Yannick Mukunzi, Niyonzima Olivier Sefu, Donkor Prosper Kuka

Ba rutahizamu: Gilbert Mugisha, Sarpong Michael Balloteri na Manishimwe Djabel

18:07

Abakinnyi 11 babanje mu kibuga ku ruhande rwa APR FC

Umunyezamu: Kimenyi Yves,

Ba myugariro: Ombolenga Fitina, Herve Rugwiro, Prince Buregeya, Iranzi Jean Claude

Abakina hagati: Mugiraneza Jean Baptiste Migi, Nizeyimana Mirafa, Imran Nshimiyimana

Ba rutahizamu: Issa Bigirimana, Muhadjiri Hakizimana na Mugunga Yves

18:05

Umukino utangijwe na APR FC

Rutahizamu Muhadjiri niwe utangije umukino ugiye kuyoborwa n'abasifuzi mpuzamahanga bayobowe na Samuel Uwikunda ufatanyije na Zephanie Hakizimana na Ndagijimana Theogene

18:02

Amakipe asohotse mu rwambaririo

Abakinnyi ba APR FC mu myenda y'umukara n'umweru (amakabutura y'umukara n'imipira y'umweru) na Rayon Sports mu myenda y'ubururu hose basohotse mu rwambariro biteguye gutangira umukino

17:51

Abakinnyi b'impande zombi bamaze kwishyushya

APR FC na Rayon Sports zizategura gutana mu mitwe zimaze kwishyushya. Mu minota mike baragaruka batangira umukino w'amateka

17:49

Amakipe yombi ntabwo ari kure ku rutonde rwa shampiyona

17:48

APR FC ya Jimmy Mulisa ihagaze neza imbere mu gihugu

17:47

Imikino itanu iheruka ku ruhande rwa Rayon Sports

17:44

Amakipe yombi yamaze kugera i Remera kare...

17:42

APR FC ni yo iheruka intsinzi muri uyu mukino

Umukino uheruka guhuza amakipe yombi muri shampiyona wabaye tariki 15 Kamena 2018. APR FC icyo gihe yatsinze Rayon Sports 2-1 naho muri rusange umukino uheruka guhuza impande zombi wabaye tariki 30 Nzeri 2018 Rayon Sports yatsinze APR FC 1-0 mu mukino wa nyuma wâ€™igikombe cyâ€™Agaciro.

17:42

Amateka avuga byinshi kuri uyu mukino


Kuva mu 1995 mu mikino yose, Rayon Sports na APR FC zimaze guhura inshuro 85. Rayon Sports yatsinzemo imikino 28, APR FC itsindamo imikino 36, zinganya imikino 23. Muri iyi mikino habonetsemo ibitego 243, harimo 118 ku ruhande rwa Rayon Sports na 125 ku ruhande rwa APR FC.

17:41

Kazungu Clever, Umuvugizi wa APR FC mu mabara yâ€™ikipe ye

17:38

Abafana ku mpande zombi babukereye

17:37

Twageze i Remera

Umugoroba mwiza kuri mwese!


IGIHE ibahaye ikaze kuri Stade Amahoro i Remera mu Karere ka Gasabo ahagiye kubera umukino w'umunsi wa munani wa shampiyona y'u Rwanda 'AZAM Rwanda Premier League' uhuza abakeba APR FC na Rayon Sports.
